attributes.additional_details: This petition is asking the government to create a Law which states that Every Citizen can have the Choice to live outside the system without money. This Self Sufficient Society will co-inside with the current one, using harvest and handmade crafts as trade for entering in and out of the current society. I want the government to take action into providing land that is able to hold up to 1 billion citizens of all nations. All that is required of this land is that it can produce good harvest and is safe from any government or corporation disruption, any additional modifications to the land will be provided by the people focusing on Eco Friendly structures and ways of life.
